trashday.storage

Class DynamoDbClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • trashday.storage.DynamoDbClient

  • public class DynamoDbClient
extends Object
    Client for DynamoDB persistence layer for the Trash Day skill. Handles save/load of specific users' Schedule data in Amazon's Dynamo DB.
    Author:
    J. Todd Baldwin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DynamoDbClient(com.amazonaws.services.dynamodbv2.AmazonDynamoDBClient dynamoDBClient)
      Create a new DB client to save/load user Schedules in Dynamo DB.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Erase a user's item in DynamoDB.

      Getter for the Dynamo DB connection itself.
      DynamoItem loadItem(DynamoItem tableItem)
      Loads an item from DynamoDB by primary Hash Key.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DynamoDbClient

        public DynamoDbClient(com.amazonaws.services.dynamodbv2.AmazonDynamoDBClient dynamoDBClient)
        Create a new DB client to save/load user Schedules in Dynamo DB.
        Parameters:
        dynamoDBClient - AmazonDynamoDBClient The Dynamo DB connection

    • Method Detail

      • getAmazonDynamoDBClient

        public com.amazonaws.services.dynamodbv2.AmazonDynamoDBClient getAmazonDynamoDBClient()
        Getter for the Dynamo DB connection itself. Used only by JUnit tests so we can do database table manipulation for test data.
        Returns:
        The Dynamo DB connection

      • loadItem

        public DynamoItem loadItem(DynamoItem tableItem)
        Loads an item from DynamoDB by primary Hash Key. Callers of this method should pass in an object which represents an item in the DynamoDB table item with the primary key populated.
        Parameters:
        tableItem - TrashDayScheduleItem Item with customer id already set based on user's Session data.
        Returns:
        Database table item retrieved based on user's customer id.

      • saveItem

        public void saveItem(DynamoItem tableItem)
        Stores an item to DynamoDB.
        Parameters:
        tableItem - TrashDayScheduleItem Item with customer id already set based on user's Session data and Schedule already set based on a previous load or user updates.

      • saveOnlyIntentLog

        public void saveOnlyIntentLog(DynamoItem tableItem)
        Stores the intent log component of an item to DynamoDB.
        Parameters:
        tableItem - TrashDayScheduleItem Item with customer id already set based on user's Session data and Schedule already set based on a previous load or user updates.

      • eraseItem

        public void eraseItem(DynamoItem tableItem)
        Erase a user's item in DynamoDB.
        Parameters:
        tableItem - TrashDayScheduleItem Item with customer id already set based on user's Session data and Schedule already set based on a previous load or user updates.
